game.name: Woodswalker
game.genres: Action, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound
game.shortDescription: Woodswalker is a strategy-based survival horror game in which quick thinking is key. Listen closely to your surroundings, defend yourself with your searchlight, budget your limited power, and solve environmental puzzles to discover the truth of the forest.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Woodswalker is a strategy-based survival horror game in which quick thinking is key. Listen closely to your surroundings, defend yourself with your searchlight, budget your limited power, and solve environmental puzzles to discover the truth of the forest.
